experiences.description: Core-engineered on MAYOHR’s frontend using TypeScript, RESTful APIs, and React; developed a high-traffic website with TypeScript, HTML, and CSS, reducing resolution time by 30%; simulated and analyzed datasets with Python for front-end testing, cutting integration bottlenecks by 25%; and designed data-access features in collaboration with product managers, boosting troubleshooting efficiency by 40%.

Organized large-scale events for 250+ attendees, cutting costs by 15% while adhering to university policies; conducted Excel-based analyses (Pivot Tables) to optimize logistics and mitigate risks; and demonstrated strong communication and organizational skills in a fast-paced environment.
